name: Boil Run
description:
Food game in action! Boil Run is World Cup of the Real Chefs!

Collect foods, cook them while moving and avoid the obstacles!
Customers will be sooo happy! If only you collect all the food...

Adjust the heat of the pan, collect whatever you want and have some fun!
Upgrade your place, get better and better. Be the master chef, cook every recipe in the world!
publishers: Hyperbox Games Yazilim Bilisim Limited Sirketi
